title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8033.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8033.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) IR 84. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of IR 84 between the New York-Pennsylvania
state line and the Orange-Dutchess county line in the Cities of Newburgh and

Port Jervis and Towns of Montgomery, Wallkill, Wawayanda, Deerpark, Greenville
and Newburgh. (b) Route 17. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of Route 17 between the Sullivan- Orange
county line and Thruway exit 16 in the Villages of Chester and Goshen and Towns
of Woodbury, Monroe, Blooming Grove, Chester, Goshen and Wallkill. (c) IR 87. The northbound and southbound
roadways of IR 87 between the Rockland-Orange county line and the Orange-Ulster
county line in the Village of Harriman and Towns of Tuxedo, Woodbury, Cornwall, New Windsor and Newburgh. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8033.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
